package.name: ITIB_MassImportProductRelations
package.summary: This module can be used to assign/update/remove product links by reading data from csv file.
package.description: This module makes use of product link API's to assign/update/remove product links by reading data from csv file.
package.notes: This module makes use of product link API's to assign/update/remove product links by reading data from csv file.
